channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- CloudEngine 12800
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- CloudEngine 12800

item.title: CVE-2016-8784|2024-08-06T02:35:00.939Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- cloudengine%2012800
item.description: Huawei CloudEngine 12800 V100R003C00, V100R003C10, V100R005C00, V100R005C10, V100R006C00 have a memory leak vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker may send specific Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) packets to the devices. When the values of some parameters in the packet are abnormal, the LDP processing module does not release the memory to handle the packet, resulting in memory leak.

item.title: CVE-2016-8782|2024-08-06T02:35:01.801Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- cloudengine%2012800
item.description: Huawei CloudEngine 12800 V100R003C00, V100R003C10, V100R005C00, V100R005C10, V100R006C00 have a memory leak vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker may send specific Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) packets to the devices repeatedly. Due to improper validation of some specific fields of the packet, the LDP processing module does not release the memory, resulting in memory leak.
